nodes.id: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

zh-cn: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 一个曾存在的县级人民武装部，受海南省军区与中共西南中沙工委双重领导，负责西沙、南沙、中沙群岛的军事守备任务，后被三沙警备区取代。
description.en: A former county-level People's Armed Forces Department under the dual leadership of the Hainan Provincial Military District and the CPC Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Working Committee. It was responsible for the military defense of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands and was later replaced by the Sansha Garrison.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海南省军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海南省军区
en: Hainan Provincial Military District of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在海南省的军事领导指挥机关。
description.en: The military leadership and command organ of the People's Liberation Army in Hainan Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛工作委员会
en: CPC Hainan Province Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Working Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西沙、南沙、中沙群岛的派出机构，与办事处合署办公。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the Communist Party of China in the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands, operating jointly with the administrative office.

nodes.id: 海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处

zh-cn: 海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处
广东省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处
西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处
en: Hainan Province Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Office

description.zh-cn: 曾是管辖西沙、南沙、中沙群岛的县级党政机关，最初为广东省人民政府的派出机构，后委托海南行政区领导。
description.en: A former county-level party and government organ administering the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands, initially a dispatched agency of the People's Government of Guangdong Province and later placed under the leadership of the Hainan Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省曾设立的副省级行政区。
description.en: A former sub-provincial administrative region once established in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial administrative organ of Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会
en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部首任负责人之一。
description.en: One of the first leaders of the People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands.

description.zh-cn: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部的参谋。
description.en: A staff officer of the People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统理查德·尼克松于1972年对中华人民共和国的访问，改善了中美关系。
description.en: The visit of U.S. President Richard Nixon to the People's Republic of China in 1972, which improved Sino-US relations.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军为守卫西沙群岛于1972年建立的军事单位。
description.en: A military unit established in 1972 by the People's Liberation Army Navy to guard the Xisha Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的海上武装力量。
description.en: The naval branch of the People's Republic of China's armed forces.

description.zh-cn: 1974年中华人民共和国与越南共和国在西沙群岛发生的海上冲突。
description.en: A naval conflict in 1974 between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Vietnam in the Paracel Islands.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军广州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广州军区
en: Guangzhou Military Region of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military leading organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海南省三沙警备区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海南省三沙警备区
en: Sansha Garrison of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 在西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部的基础上组建的警备区。
description.en: A garrison established on the basis of the People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands.

relationships.source: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海南省军区

description.zh-cn: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部受海南省军区与中共西南中沙工委双重领导。
description.en: The People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands was under the dual leadership of the Hainan Provincial Military District and the CPC Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Working Committee.

relationships.source: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部
relationships.target: 中国共产党海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部受海南省军区与中共西南中沙工委双重领导。
description.en: The People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands was under the dual leadership of the Hainan Provincial Military District and the CPC Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Working Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海南省军区
relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 1959年3月，海南军区派出军事工作队设立了西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部。
description.en: In March 1959, the Hainan Military District dispatched a military work team to establish the People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands.

relationships.target: 海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处

description.zh-cn: 1959年3月1日成立的“广东省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处”是广东省人民政府的派出机构。
description.en: The 'Guangdong Province Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Office', established on March 1, 1959, was a dispatched agency of the People's Government of Guangdong Province.

relationships.source: 中国共产党广东省委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 1959年3月1日成立的“中国共产党西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛工作委员会”是中共广东省委的派出机构。
description.en: The 'CPC Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Working Committee', established on March 1, 1959, was a dispatched agency of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee.

relationships.source: 海南省西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处

description.zh-cn: 西南中沙群岛办事处成立后，委托海南行政区领导。
description.en: After its establishment, the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands Office was placed under the leadership of the Hainan Administrative Region.

relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 黄亚俊是西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部创立时的负责人。
description.en: Huang Yajun was the head of the People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands at the time of its founding.

relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 王行芬是西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部创立时的参谋。
description.en: Wang Xingfen was a staff officer of the People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands at the time of its founding.

relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 尼克松访华改善了中美关系，美国表示不插手西沙问题，这促使毛泽东指示加强西沙设防，随后西南中沙人武部于1972年8月组建了多个基干武装民兵连，加强了其军事力量。
description.en: Nixon's visit to China improved Sino-US relations, with the US indicating it would not intervene in the Xisha issue. This prompted Mao Zedong to order the strengthening of Xisha's defenses, leading the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Armed Forces Department to form several core armed militia companies in August 1972, enhancing its military strength.

relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 在尼克松访华后指示开展西沙设防工程，直接促使了西南中沙人武部在1972年8月进行扩编和战备升级。
description.en: After Nixon's visit to China, Mao Zedong instructed to carry out fortification projects in Xisha, directly prompting the expansion and combat readiness upgrade of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Armed Forces Department in August 1972.

description.zh-cn: 1972年12月底，中国海军组建了海军西沙巡防区（即西沙水警区）。
description.en: At the end of December 1972, the Chinese Navy established the Xisha Naval Patrol Area (i.e., Xisha Naval Garrison).

relationships.source: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 在西沙海战期间，西南中沙人武部所属的武装民兵排直接参与了在永乐群岛的战斗，对战事发展起到了重要作用。
description.en: During the Battle of the Paracel Islands, the armed militia platoon of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Armed Forces Department directly participated in the fighting in the Yongle Islands, playing an important role in the development of the conflict.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 命令西南中沙人武部组织武装民兵排参与西沙海战。
description.en: Ordered the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Armed Forces Department to organize an armed militia platoon to participate in the Battle of the Paracel Islands.

relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 于1974年6月决定将西沙群岛的所有守岛任务划归海军西沙巡防区领导，此举使西南中沙人武部不再担负军事守备任务。
description.en: In June 1974, decided to transfer all island defense duties in the Xisha Islands to the leadership of the Xisha Naval Patrol Area, which resulted in the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Armed Forces Department no longer undertaking military defense tasks.

relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部

description.zh-cn: 于1974年9月19日接替了西沙群岛的全部防务，导致西南中沙人武部下属的民兵连被撤销，其军事守备任务终止。
description.en: On September 19, 1974, it took over all defense duties of the Xisha Islands, leading to the disbandment of the militia companies under the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Armed Forces Department and the termination of its military defense mission.

relationships.source: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海南省三沙警备区

description.zh-cn: 2012年7月19日，西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛人民武装部被撤销，并在其基础上组建了三沙警备区。
description.en: On July 19, 2012, the People's Armed Forces Department of the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands was abolished, and the Sansha Garrison was established on its foundation.
